author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Phoenix Publishing & Media unit signs contract to sell 21 pct stake in software firm for 61.3 mln yuan
text:
Feb 28(Reuters) - Jiangsu Phoenix Publishing & Media Corp Ltd
* Says coâ€™s Jiangsu-based wholly owned unit signed contract to sell 21 percent stake in a Xiamen-based software firm to a limited partnership and two individuals, for 61.3 million yuan
* Says unit will hold 30 percent stake in the Xiamen-based software firm after transaction
